replyCodeResponses.125: 125 Data connection already open. Starting transfer for %s.
replyCodeResponses.202: 202 Sorry, that command is not implemented in this server.
replyCodeResponses.211: 211 System status, or system help reply.
replyCodeResponses.214: 214 Help message. On how to use the server or the meaning of a particular non-standard command.  This reply is useful only to the human user.
replyCodeResponses.215: 215 NAME system type. Where NAME is an official system name from the list in the Assigned Numbers document.
replyCodeResponses.225: 225 Data connection open; no transfer in progress.
replyCodeResponses.350: 350 Requested file action pending further information.
replyCodeResponses.421: 421 Service not available, closing control connection. This may be a reply to any command if the service knows it must shut down.
replyCodeResponses.450: 450 Requested file action not taken. File unavailable (e.g., file busy).
replyCodeResponses.451: 451 Requested action aborted: local error in processing.
replyCodeResponses.452: 452 Requested action not taken. Insufficient storage space in system.
replyCodeResponses.500: 500 Syntax error, command unrecognized. This may include errors such as command line too long.
replyCodeResponses.501: 501 Syntax error in parameters or arguments.
replyCodeResponses.504: 504 Command not implemented for that parameter.
replyCodeResponses.551: 551 Requested action aborted: page type unknown.
replyCodeResponses.552: 552 Requested file action aborted. Exceeded storage allocation (for current directory or dataset).
replyCodeResponses.553: 553 Requested action not taken. File name not allowed.
